sections.question: What kind of fabric do you use in your collections?
sections.answer: We use a variety of premium fabrics such as lawn, chiffon, velvet, and cotton, ensuring both comfort and style in every season.

sections.question: Do you offer both stitched and unstitched options?
sections.answer: Yes, we offer both stitched and unstitched options, allowing our customers to choose what best suits their needs.

sections.question: How can I place an order?
sections.answer: At the moment, orders can only be placed through our Instagram. We are in the process of implementing a payment system on our website, and it will be available soon.

sections.question: What payment methods do you accept?
sections.answer: We accept payments via bank transfer, credit/debit card, and cash on delivery (COD) within Pakistan.

sections.question: Do you offer international shipping?
sections.answer: Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping charges and delivery times vary depending on the destination.

sections.question: Can I return or exchange a product?
sections.answer: We offer exchanges on items that are defective or damaged during delivery. However, we do not accept returns for unstitched fabric or customized pieces.

sections.question: How can I stay updated on new launches and offers?
sections.answer: Follow us on Instagram and subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on our latest collections, launches, and exclusive offers.
